title: sebastin
author: sebastin
content: Hi guys,I want to sell my Football Formation Maker SAAS teamsculpt.com (Domain + WebApp)Site for Sale:--------------------https://teamsculpt.com/Proof of Ownership:--------------------https://teamsculpt.com/proofs.txtWebsite Traffic info:---------------------------https://shush.page/teamsculpt.comDomain Info:----------------Registered on Google.DomainsWill be transferred to you.Hosting Info:---------------Hosted on a Contobo VPS serverCan be run on a $7 DigitalOcean VPS or any shared hostingMore Info:-----------------This is a side project I did, and I was thinking of developing it into a full-fledged SAAS for football enthusiasts.As I was done developing this site, I got engaged to a different project, and I am unable to work on this anymore.I am selling this site/app as it is and will not be developing new features.I will help you transfer the site and content (webapp) to you.There is no maintenance needed to run this site as the users do the marketing by sharing the formation they create to other users.Sale Info:-------------Reason: PersonalPRICE: 4K USDPayment Method: Paypal, Bitcoin, ESCROWThe site is for sale completely. I will also take care of the complete move to the buyer at no extra cost.
